Reviews.Title: Good little cellphone
Reviews.Author: geph "OFFLINE GUY"
Reviews.Content: I have only used this phone for about a week.  I haven't really gotten any real use out of the phone.  But what I have to say about it is, is it is a super design!  It is sleek.  The bluetooth works like a charm--easy to use.  The phone came with a 2 year old battery--bummer, but I bought a new one and now it is humming right along!

Reviews.Title: Motorola RAZR V3 GSM Mobile Camera Phone (Silver)
Reviews.Author: Robin Grepo
Reviews.Content: I bought this used through Amazon but the phone has many problems! Half the time you can't hear the person calling you and you're forced to call them back. Also, it is a model that doesn't have the "Favorite Five" display, so you are forced to call customer service to set up and/or change your favorite five. Also, when using blue tooth earpiece and then you remove the earpiece from the phone, the phone then stops working (you can't hear anything or call anyone) unless the blue tooth is constantly plugged in. Not the greatest choice of phone!

Reviews.Title: RAZR V3
Reviews.Author: Mark F. Upshaw
Reviews.Content: After hearing all of the horror stories about why not to purchase this product, I have been very happy with it.The display is large enough for me to see.  It's very user friendly, and all of the function keys are conveniently placed on the handset.I have nothing but positive praise for this phone.
